articles.title: Bitcoin tops record $80,000 as Trump nears sweep of US Congress - BBC.com
articles.description: On the campaign trail the president-elect pledged to make America "the crypto capital of the planet".
articles.content:
The price of bitcoin has risen above $80,000 (£62,000) for the first time ever, after Donald Trump's decisive victory in the US election last week.
It comes as the Republicans are edging closer to o… [+1740 chars]
